mapper.insert: insert into member (id, pw, name, email, phone) values (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone})
insert into member (id, pw, name, email, phone) values (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone})
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where id=#{id}
select pw from member where id=#{array[0]} and name=#{array[1]}
select email from member where id=#{array[0]} and name=#{array[1]}
